instructions: Heat butter and oil in a pan.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for 1-2 minutes.
Add tomato puree and cook until the oil separates from the mixture.
Add cumin powder, coriander powder, red chilli powder, and turmeric powder. Mix well.
Add paneer and salt. Mix well and cook for 5 minutes.
Add cream and mix well.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves.
Serve hot with roti or naan.

ingredients: 3 cups basmati rice, washed and soaked
instructions: Heat ghee in a large pan.
Add cumin seeds and let them splutter.
Add sliced onions and fry until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for 1-2 minutes.
Add chopped tomatoes and sauté until the oil separates from the mixture.
Add green chillies, coriander powder, garam masala, red chilli powder, and turmeric powder. Mix well.
Add chicken pieces and yogurt. Mix well and cook for 10-15 minutes.
Add fresh mint leaves, fresh coriander leaves, and salt. Mix well.
Add soaked basmati rice and water. Mix well and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low, cover the pan with a lid, and cook for 20-25 minutes or until the rice is cooked and the water is absorbed.
Garnish with fried onions.
Serve hot with raita and salad.
